name: page-structural-semantics-scanner-tests
description: Test and benchmarking suite for code that extracts information on the structure of web pages, such as landmarks, headings and articles
author: Matthew Tylee Atkinson

scripts.post_build: echo 'Remember to check the example scripts before publishing.'
scripts.version: conventional-changelog-moulded-angular 'Page Structural Semantics Scanner Tests' && git add CHANGELOG.md

hooks.pre-commit: npm run build && git add README.md
